name: Fruits Survivors
description:
This is my entry for Brackeys Game Jam whose theme is : An End is a new Beginning

 This is also my take on Vampire Survivors trend, creating a game inspired by the game.

Control scheme:

- Numpad keys = Move around.

- X = Shoots projectiles.

- Enter = Confirm/Pause the game.

- F8 = Take a screenshot.

Features:

- Can move and shoot in 8 directions.

- 4 different playables : Chorgu, Gerra, Jeron and Pirl. Each with its own pros and cons.

- Vampire Survivors style upgrade system.

- Increasing difficulty.

- Dying will autorevive to other playable while retaining upgrades. Limited though.

Enjoy this monster shooting fiesta and survive as long as you can!
